<extra_id_0> Pit-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a pituitary - specific transcription factor that binds to and transactivates promoters of growth hormone and prolactin genes .

In three unrelated Japanese children with combined pituitary hormone deficiency , we identified three point mutations in the <extra_id_0> Pit-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene , Pro24Leu , Arg143Gln , and Arg271Trp , located on the major transactivation region , POU - specific domain , and POU-homeodomain , respectively .
